amendment.description: Amendment strikes the sense of Congress provision in the bill with respect to the budgetary treatment of the FLAME fund.
amendment.purpose: Amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 111-52 to strike from the bill the Sense of Congress language on the designation of Flame Fund appropriations as emergency spending.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rahall amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Rahall.
